command.name: submit AccountSet
command.desc: Submit an AccountSet transaction. This set various flags of the account entry.

command.name: submit SetRegularKey
command.desc: Submit an SetRegularKey transaction. This set various flags of the account entry.

command.name: submit OfferCreate
command.desc: Submit an OfferCreate transaction. This set various flags of the account entry.

command.name: submit OfferCancel
command.desc: Submit an OfferCancel transaction. This set various flags of the account entry.

command.name: submit TrustSet
command.desc: Submit a TrustSet transaction. This set various flags of the account entry.
